name: Tempus (ryan)
description:
Guide a sphere along bright, geometric shapes. Shoot at enemies to earn points.

Controls

Move left/right (including menus)
-A/D (Keyboard)
-Left stick/horizontal Dpad (PS4 Dualshock)
-Left stick (Oculus Quest)

Fire/select
-Space (Keyboard)
-Circle (PS4 Dualshock)
-A (Oculus Quest)

Jump
-Left Shift (Keyboard)
-Left Trigger (PS4 Dualshock)
-Left Trigger (Oculus Quest)
